about_the_game:
Olympian Wars is a CCG with an unique take on how to play a CCG , the deck is build along the game
In the beginning of every match the player gets to choose his hand from a pool of cards , then on the beginning of each turn there will be 3 new card picked at random from 2 pools of cards , the players class pool and the arena class pool , each arena will have their own pool of cards from where both players potential get cards that has the game progresses the rarity of the 3 cards will increase , those cards will be displayed in the shop

Currently the game is in a early stage and there is still a lot of work to be done m if the idea seems like something interesting please wishlited
If you have any question about the project feel free to contact me altevilstudious@gmail.com

Have a great day
